titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Len Coombs

publicationstmt.publisher: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created by Len Coombs 2003-05
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English.

change.item: Converted to EAD2002 using Word macro and Xmetal
Original encoding in EAD ver. 1.0 from Word 6.0 file using word macros and manual tagging in A/E.

titlepage.publisher:
Michigan Historical Collections
Bentley Historical Library
University of Michigan
titlepage.titleproper:
Finding Aid for
Frank Richard Jung photograph collection. 1919.
titlepage.author:
Finding aid prepared by:
Len Coombs

did.abstract: Member of the 168th Co. Transportation Corps who served in the Allied intervention in Russia, 1918-1920, the "Polar Bear Expedition." Collection includes group portraits of units of the 168th Company Transportation Corps, who served with the Polar Bear Expedition.

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: The collection was donated by Frank R. Jung, of Prescott, Arizona, in 1963 (Donor no.: 4079).

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

prefercite.p: item, folder title, box no., Frank Richard Jung photograph collection, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

scopecontent.p: The collection contains group portraits of units of the 168th Co. Transportation Corps.
